original_text: Then Joshua and all Israel with him passed on from Lachish to Eglon. And they laid siege to it and fought against it.
korean_text: 여호수아가 온 이스라엘과 더불어 라기스에서 에글론으로 나아가서 대진하고 싸워

sentences.original_text: Then Joshua and all Israel with him
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 여호수아와 그와 함께 있는 온 이스라엘이

sentences.original_text: passed on from Lachish to Eglon.
And they laid siege to it
